column1: Objective: Provide a clear, aggregated summary of performance and pinpoint specific gaps so the teacher can intervene
The teacher dashboard should have two parts: Part I overall class review; Actionable Insights
Avg Difficulty: Helps identify students coasting on easy problems vs. those pushing themselves
Interactions N: High interactions with low mastery might indicate a student is trying hard but confused
Most common Errors (list of exercises that were mostly answered wrong by the students)
Most common Promts (list of common words/concept that were mostly answered  by the students)
